Access to Confluence repositories by pri.Data: Confluence Access Logs, Windows Event ID 4624
Access to Confluence repositories by pri.Action: Monitor Confluence Access Logs for successful logins and page views. Cross-reference accessed user accounts against a list of privileged accounts. Identify users with no prior history of Confluence access (e.g., calculate access frequency per user over time and flag users with zero or low frequency accessing it for the first time). Investigate access by privileged or new/unusual users.

A user account rapidly accessing or retr.Action: Analyze Confluence Access Logs (and potentially Zeek http.log if available and relevant) to count the number of documents/pages accessed per user within a given time window. Calculate baseline access rates per user. Use statistical methods like Z-score or IQR to identify users accessing significantly more documents than their typical behavior or the group average within a short period.
